name.ja: <ruby>赤<rt>あか</rt></ruby><ruby>酢<rt>ず</rt></ruby>の<ruby>踏<rt>ふみ</rt></ruby><ruby>切<rt>きり</rt></ruby>

text.en: You can only control 1 "Red Vinegar Crossing". If your opponent controls a card in this Set card's column: You can activate this card; return all other cards in its column to the hand. Neither player can use the unused zones in this card's column.
